name: Word Search7 Multiple Choice Quiz | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: A common viper is seen in the board-game 'Snakes and Ladders'?
questions.explanation:
Adder & adder & Snake & snake.

	lADDERs. An adder is a common viper. Snake is also accepted.

questions.text: A rod used by a water diviner or magician goes missing now and then?
questions.explanation:
Wand & wand.

	noW AND. A wand is a rod used by a magician or water diviner.

questions.text: A district of New York City is visited by Charlemagne?
questions.explanation:
Harlem & harlem.

	cHARLEMange. Harlem is a district of New York City in North-East Manhattan.

questions.text: Within the caves at Lascaux are a collection of maps?
questions.explanation:
Atlas & atlas.

	AT LAScaux. An atlas is a collection of maps usually in book form.

questions.text: 'The Lady of Shalott' is an angel, even a saint with a ring of light around her head?
questions.explanation:
Halo & halo.

	sHALOtt. A halo is a ring of light around the head of an angel or saint. The 'Lady of Shalott' was a poem by Alfred Lord Tennyson.

questions.text: A person who belongs to a club visits Camembert, a village in Normandy?
questions.explanation:
Member & member.

	caMEMBERt. A member is a person who belongs to a club, political party etc.

questions.text: A very strong desire to be illustrated?
questions.explanation:
Lust & lust.

	ilLUSTrated. Lust is a strong desire or drive.

questions.text: The Ayatollah is exiled on the circular coral reef?
questions.explanation:
Atoll & atoll.

	ayATOLLah. An atoll is a circular coral reef.

questions.text: How can anyone mistake a gorilla with a guerrilla?
questions.explanation:
Err & err.

	guERRilla. Err is to make a mistake.

questions.text: The card game 'beggar-my-neighbour' is played by the military land forces of a nation?
questions.explanation:
Army & army.

	beggAR-MY. The army are the military land forces of a nation.

questions.text: To climb a pole or tree in Washington by gripping with the hands or arms and the legs and hauling oneself up?
questions.explanation:
Shin & limb.

	waSHINgton. Shin is to climb a pole or tree by gripping with the hands or arms and the legs and hauling oneself up.

questions.text: An individual bell or the sound it makes when struck by Archimedes?
questions.explanation:
Chime & chime.

	arCHIMEdes. Chime is an individual bell or the sound it makes when struck.

questions.text: Destroyers ruin the site of the Trojan War?
questions.explanation:
Troy & troy.

	desTROYers. Troy was the site of the Trojan War.

questions.text: Is the river Tiber the colour green in Heraldry?
questions.explanation:
Vert & vert.

	riVER Tiber. Vert is the colour green in Heraldry.

questions.text: A gargoyle assists the ship in which Jason sailed in search of the Golden Fleece?
questions.explanation:
Argo & argo.

	gARGOyle. In Greek Mythology, the Argo was the ship in which Jason sailed in search of the Golden Fleece.

questions.text: Boadicea, a queen of the Iceni, could cut food into small cubes?
questions.explanation:
Dice & dice.

	boaDICEa. Dice is to cut food into small cubes.

questions.text: King Nebuchadnezzar came from this landlocked republic in North Central Africa?
questions.explanation:
Chad & chad.

	nebuCHADnezzar. Chad is a landlocked republic in North central Africa.

questions.text: To purchase a Volkswagen Beetle, one needs payment in return for work?
questions.explanation:
Wage & wage.

	volksWAGEn. A wage is payment in return for work or services.

questions.text: Please take away the large New Zealand parrot?
questions.explanation:
Kea & kea.

	taKE Away. A kea is a large New Zealand parrot.

questions.text: A sloven has a passionate desire, longing and feelings for Slovenia?
questions.explanation:
Love & love.

	sLOVEn or sLOVEnia. Love is to have passionate desire, longing and feeling for.

questions.text: A single section of a contest is competed by Cathy and Heathcliff?
questions.explanation:
Heat & heat.

	HEATcliff. In sport, a heat is a single section of a contest.

questions.text: Does the Tomb Raider interweave several strands of her hair?
questions.explanation:
Braid & braid.

	tomB RAIDer. Braid is to interweave several strands of hair, to plait.

questions.text: A large marble used for shooting can be found at Ottawa, the capital of Canada?
questions.explanation:
Taw & taw.

	otTAWa. Taw is a large marble used for shooting.

questions.text: A mountain range between the Rivers Rhine and Rhone was the setting of 'Jurassic Park'?
questions.explanation:
Jura & jura.

	JURAssic. Jura is a mountain range between the Rivers Rhine and Rhone, mostly in Eastern France and extending into Western Switzerland.

questions.text: A summary at the end of a novel of further developments in the lives of the characters Vasco da Gama and buccaneer Henry Morgan?
questions.explanation:
Coda & coda.

	vasCO DA gama. Coda is a summary at the end of a novel of further developments in the lives of the characters. Hope you enjoyed the wordsearch. If you find any alternative answers please let me know. Cheers.
